name: Sentinel Kaleidio Edition
description:
A single level prototype with provided assets from the Staffordshire University Sentinel framework, demonstrating my learning from UE4's blueprint and level editor.  Just some basics put together in an interesting environment, showcasing my initial skills on environmental storytelling, mechanic use, and level design.

You are a sentinel in a robotic space station created by a power station company.  The reactor core has exploded, sending magnetic, hot shards of the multidimensional material throughout the facility.  With the coolant fluid too hot to use, you must escape before it kills you.

Controls:

Left Click - Hit
Right Click - Use
WASD - Move/Push
Space - Jump

Collect blue barrels to heal, use the shield to not take damage.   Push large boxes and platform over lava.  Avoid yellow and pink projectiles/objects.  Find the exit.
